page.title: 16HOUSING IN LEUCHARS
page.content: There are a variety of house types in Leuchars. This is partly due to the fact that the original village of Leuchars has been expanded to accommodate the work of the RAF Base. In the older part of the town - Main Street and School Hill are privately owned and terraced, the remainder are semi-detached. There were no detached houses nor any bungalows. In the newer part of the town such as St Bunyans, Ferns Place, and most of the RAF streets, the houses belonging to the officers tend to be detached or semi-detached, while those belonging to the lower ranks are mainly terraced. This area differs from the old part of the town due to the gardens and open space.
